page.title: 01LOCAL ENVIRONMENT
page.content: The area is mainly rural and agricultural. There are several farm estates. The ground level is very flat compared to other areas. There are some woods but not many. There are no large forests. The land is used for two things, one crops and two cattle. There are several main roads and most fields can be entered from the roads. In the winter some of the area has no protection from the wind and snow. this can cause trouble because the snowplough by clearing the road, blocks up the private roads and entrances. The area is fairly near to main towns and cities.
